article: the us military has begun considering possible reinforcements in iraq , as the us-led coalition announced that radical shiite leader moqtada sadr , blamed for inciting violence last weekend , is wanted for murder .
abstract: more us forces considered for iraq as coalition seeks shiite cleric for murder
